name: A Day in the Life of a Social Worker
name_original: A Day in the Life of a Social Worker
description: This game walks the user through the first day on the job of a behavioral health social worker. Learn important skills like asking open-ended questions or using the Maslow hierarchy of needs to prioritize client needs. Users will learn about the skills that a beginning social worker uses in their career. Learn more at https://playhigher.wvu.edu.
